DataElement.preferredName: Bone Marrow Aspirate And/Or Biopsy Performed Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The date of which the bone marrow aspirate and/or biopsy was performed.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Bone Marrow Aspirate And/Or Biopsy Performed
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The tissue occupying the spaces of bone. It consists of blood vessel sinuses and a network of hematopoietic cells which give rise to the red cells, white cells, and megakaryocytes._Fluid withdrawn from a body cavity, cyst, or tumor._Used to indicate that either or both of two items or options may be valid._The removal of tissue specimens or fluid from the living body for microscopic examination, performed to establish a diagnosis._Executed and carried through to completion.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The soft, sponge-like tissue in the center of bones that produces white blood cells, red blood cells, and platelets.

Concepts.definition: The tissue occupying the spaces of bone. It consists of blood vessel sinuses and a network of hematopoietic cells which give rise to the red cells, white cells, and megakaryocytes.

Property.preferredDefinition: (AS-pi-rit) Fluid withdrawn from a lump, often a cyst, or a nipple.:Used to indicate that either or both of two items or options:Removal and pathologic examination of specimens in the form of small pieces of tissue from the living body.:Performed; carried out.

Concepts.definition: Fluid withdrawn from a body cavity, organ, cyst, or tumor.
Used to indicate that either or both of two items or options may be valid.
The removal of tissue specimens or fluid from the living body for microscopic examination, performed to establish a diagnosis.
Executed and carried through to completion.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Tests, examinations, evaluations used to determine a subject's status or response to intervention.
ConceptualDomain.changeDescription: Created initially to support CCR value domain for CTMS.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/3/17 tt added Diagnosis CSI. 6/20/17 jk transferred to NCI Standards per confirmation by Brian Campbell as part of Round 5 finalization task, added reg status.

ReferenceDocuments.name: PQT
ReferenceDocuments.description: What was the date the bone marrow aspirate and/or biopsy was performed?
